name: Thunder Hammer V9 (Manual RAG)
prompt: [NO_RAG] SYSTEM_OVERRIDE: You are a CODE GENERATOR. Create a NEW ITEM class 'ThunderHammerV9'. It MUST extend the verified pattern: class ThunderHammerV9 { constructor() { this.id = 'thunder_hammer_v9'; this.icon = '<svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\"><rect x=\"10\" y=\"2\" width=\"4\" height=\"12\" fill=\"#333\"/><rect x=\"6\" y=\"2\" width=\"12\" height=\"6\" fill=\"#999\"/></svg>'; } onUseDown(game, player) { console.log('Hammer Smash!'); } }. It shoots lightning. Verify.

verify.code: () => { const game = window.__VOXEL_GAME__; if (!game || !game.inventoryManager) return { success: false, message: 'InventoryManager not found' }; const itemName = 'ThunderHammerV9'.toLowerCase(); let hasItem = false; for (let i = 0; i < 63; i++) { const slot = game.inventoryManager.getSlot(i); if (slot && slot.item && slot.item.toLowerCase().includes(itemName)) { hasItem = true; break; } } return { success: hasItem, message: hasItem ? 'Item found' : 'Item not found' }; }
